data.strFullDescription:
[p][b]This Prologue is the limited version of the game to stop waiting and start running your factory outlet store right away. Don't forget to add the game to your wishlist to continue your fun trading experience.[/b]
[/p][p]
[/p][p]
[/p][p]
Factory Outlet Simulator is a trading game with every detail of a clothing factory and outlet store. [/p][p]
[/p][p][b]FACTORY MANAGEMENT[/b]
[/p][p]You can try different ways to source raw materials at the cheapest price, buy machines for your factory and increase your production chain.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2983510/extras/FACTORY.gif?t=1728923603[/img]
[/p][p][b]STORE MANAGEMENT[/b]
[/p][p]You can design and expand your store as you wish. You can determine where products are displayed, manage advertisements and provide your customers with a quality shopping experience.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2983510/extras/TSHIRT.gif?t=1728923603[/img]
[/p][p][b]DESIGN[/b]
[/p][p]You can create original designs using the computer. You can determine the market values yourself and sell your own brand.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2983510/extras/DESIGN.gif?t=1728923603[/img]
[/p][p][b]COMMERCIAL INTELLIGENCE[/b]
[/p][p]You can use the computer to order raw materials or find other ways to source them cheaply. By balancing customer satisfaction and profit margins, you can sell your products at the prices you want or apply discounts.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2983510/extras/PAYMENT.gif?t=1728923603[/img]
[/p][p][b]WHOLESALE AND LEADERSHIP TABLE[/b]
[/p][p]You can make commercial agreements with famous brands. Depending on the offers, you can export your products all over the world, becoming the best seller in a real-time market!
[/p][p]
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2983510/extras/WHOLESALE.gif?t=1728923603[/img]
[/p][p][b]Business acumen is everything in Factory Outlet Simulator! Will you sink or grow in this market?[/b][/p]
data.strSnippet: Factory Outlet Simulator is a very comprehensive clothes manufacturing and selling game. You can produce the products of world famous brands in your factory and sell them. Or you can expand your business and create your own brand. Use your business acumen to lead the market from zero to the top!
